attributes.action: No To Nine-hour day school plan.
attributes.additional_details:
Fatigue fear over longer school day

A move towards nine-hour school days and longer terms could leave many children exhausted and too tired to learn, it has been suggested Under plans reportedly being examined by the Conservatives, school hours would be extended, with pupils staying until around 6pm, while school holidays would be cut almost in half, to around seven weeks a  year. children are already tired at the end school day, and need regular breaks to help them prowhat they have learnt in the classroom.Stsometimes earlier, to 3pm, or 3.30pm.

This will be a major problem to both parents and pupils.Sign this Petition inorder to stop the government legalising this pathetic plan of theirs.
